author: Reuters Editorial
title: Freenet Says Upgrades 2018 Guidance, Raises Div For 2017
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Freenet AG:
* SAYS WITH A RECORD RESULT, FREENET AG HAS MET GUIDANCE FOR 2017, PROPOSES A FURTHER INCREASE IN DIVIDEND AND FORECASTS A STABLE GROWTH FOR 2018
* ‍PROPOSED DIVIDEND INCREASE TO 1.65 EUROS FOR 2017​ * ‍GUIDANCE FOR 2018 UPGRADED IN VIEW OF A STABLE MOBILE COMMUNICATION BUSINESS AND GROWTH PROSPECTS IN TV AND MEDIA SEGMENT​
* ‍AIMS TO ACHIEVE STABLE GROUP REVENUE IN 2018​ * ‍SEES 2018 EBITDA EXCLUDING SUNRISE AT 410-430 MILLION EUROS​
* ‍SEES 2018 FREE CASH FLOW EXCLUDING SUNRISE OF 290-310 MILLION EURO​ Source text for Eikon:
